sentences.en: "It's" (with an apostrophe) should be used only as a contraction for "it is".
sentences.cn: it's（带撇号）只能用作itis的缩约形式。

sentences.en: Cold weather causes a contraction of two inches in the bridge.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气会使这座桥缩短两英寸.

sentences.en: Contraction of the timbers left gaps in the fence.
sentences.cn: 木料收缩,结果围墙露出缝来.

sentences.en: During inhalation, contraction of the intercostal muscles elevates the ribs.
sentences.cn: 吸气时肋间肌收缩,提起肋骨.

sentences.en: Eventually the star's contraction slows down.
sentences.cn: 最后,恒星的收缩终于慢了下来.

sentences.en: I generate my own electricity, and send out impulses to trigger contraction.
sentences.cn: 我给自己发电, 发出兴奋波,引起收缩.

sentences.en: I thought the ordinary Scottish contraction of the name had been Effie.
sentences.cn: 我想这个名字在苏格兰通常的简称是艾菲.

sentences.en: In a contraction, positive work is done on the system.
sentences.cn: 在压缩过程中, 对体系作正功.

sentences.en: In higher animals, contraction became the specialized function of muscle cells.
sentences.cn: 到了较高等的动物, 收缩作用成为肌细胞的特有功能.

sentences.en: It'should be noted that the consultative style can allow contraction.
sentences.cn: 应该注意,在商榷语气中可以有缩略表达.

sentences.en: the contraction of metal as it cools
the expansion and contraction of the metal
The forces of expansion are balanced by forces of contraction.
sentences.cn: 扩张力和收缩力相互平衡.

sentences.en: The hormone that stimulates gall bladder contraction was called cholecystokinin.
sentences.cn: 刺激胆囊收缩的激素被称为胆囊收缩素.

sentences.en: These jets are usually either endplate or contraction types.
sentences.cn: 这种实验段通常有端板型的或收缩型的.

sentences.en: These rhythmic waves of muscular relaxation and contraction are called peristalsis.
sentences.cn: 这种肌肉舒张和收缩的有节律波动称为蠕动.

phrases.tran_cn: 体积收缩；容积收缩；音量压缩

trans.tran_cn: 收缩，宫缩，（词的）缩约形式
trans.tran_en: a very strong and painful movement of a muscle, especially the muscles around the  womb  during birth
